content:
Hello, I'm Shakib Izaz Mahmud, a dedicated Software Quality Assurance (SQA) Engineer. With a focus on ensuring top-notch software quality, I excel in analyzing, testing, and refining applications. My expertise lies in creating robust testing strategies, executing comprehensive test plans, and identifying and reporting bugs. I am skilled in various SQA methodologies and techniques to deliver reliable and flawless software solutions. Let's collaborate to enhance the user experience and optimize product performance.
Download my resum√© .
